title: BRIEF-First Financial Corporation Reports 2017 Results
text:
February 6, 2018 / 3:36 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-First Financial Corporation Reports 2017 Results Reuters Staff 
Feb 6 (Reuters) - First Financial Corp: * FIRST FINANCIAL REPORTS 2017 RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.21 
* ‍BOOK VALUE PER SHARE WAS $33.77 AT DECEMBER 31, 2017 COMPARED TO $33.92 AT DECEMBER 31, 2016​ 
* FIRST FINANCIAL - NET INTEREST INCOME FOR Q4 INCREASED $1.3 MILLION TO $27.7 MILLION 
* ‍AVERAGE TOTAL LOANS FOR Q4 OF 2017 WERE $1.87 BILLION, AN INCREASE OF $44.1 MILLION OR 2.41%​ 
* CO‘S TANGIBLE COMMON EQUITY TO TANGIBLE ASSET RATIO WAS 12.74% AT DECEMBER 31, 2017, COMPARED TO 12.80% AT DECEMBER 31, 2016​ 
* TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT RESULTED IN A NON-CASH TAX EXPENSE OF $6.3 MILLION​ IN Q4 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
